name: Geometric Mayhem
description:
This is game where you try and survive as long as possible while racking up the most points.  You can choose between 6 different shapes to fight the 6 different infected shape variants!  It's like a bullet hell but there's no bullets, just tons of unique enemies!  And no this isn't a math game.

Circle-Shoots like an AR

Triangle-Shoots like a shotgun

Square-Shoots like a burst AR

Pentagon-Shoots like a sniper rifle

Hexagon-Throws multiple boomerangs

Heptagon-Shoots a bullet that bounces up and down in a column

Thanks Alex-Productions for the music
